#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000009
#define MAXN 100005
#define pi 3.14159
#define D 1009
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 

map<int,int64>m;
map<int,int64>::iterator it;

int main(){
	int64 n;
	int i,val;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&val);
		m[val]++;
	}
	int64 ans=n*(n-1);
	ans/=2;
	int64 sub=0;
	for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++){
		int64 temp=it->second;
		temp*=(temp-1);
		temp/=2;
		sub+=temp;
	}
	ans-=sub;
	cout<<ans;
	return 0;
}
